hero.title: Public record
hero.lede: Verification artifacts with dates, sources, and notes.

doctrine.listBody: Each row is a verification artifact (scan layer). Open an entry for full substantiation and linked files. Claims are indexed on the Brief page; proof binds to those claims where they appear.

list.title: Artifacts
list.lede: Entries are evidence-forward and link to indexed claims.
list.empty: No public record entries are available.
